text:
A first stab at refactoring the ant build to move most of the properties in build.properties.sample into 
the src/targets/properties-build.xml file, leaving only optional entries in the build.properties.sample 
file.  However both the Cocoon and Tomcat root directory properties are commented out by default...

The patch also adds two 'fail' conditions to the initi-build.xml file to cause the build to fail if the 
Cocoon and Tomcat root directories have not been specified.  This ensures that users are forced to 
specify the location of their builds and be aware of the need for Cocoon and Tomcat installations.

Note that, in keeping with previous discussions it would be good to make the build default to Cocoon's 
jetty installation, but I should get my build running first!
creator: stuart.roebuck@adolos.co.uk
